content.prompt:
Ivan Vdovin / Alamy Stock Photo

The use of horns in the Ikenga (shrine figure) shown alludes to

choices.label: a hereditary title granted by ancestors
a spiritual affiliation with male deities
the specific occupation of the subject
the aggressive strength of the head

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
